items.name: is-browser
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A library that checks if the code is running in a browser.

items.name: create-context
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A library that creates a context.

items.name: use-isomorphic-layout-effect
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook that uses either `useLayoutEffect` or `useEffect` based on the environment (client-side or server-side).

items.name: use-is-match-media
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook that checks if the media query matches.

items.name: use-latest
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to get the latest value of a variable

items.name: use-effect-event
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to declare an effect event

items.name: use-swr
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to fetch data with SWR

items.name: use-query
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to fetch data with TanStack Query

items.name: use-mcp
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to fetch data with MCP

items.name: use-is-hydrated
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to check if the component is hydrated

items.name: use-is-online
items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
items.description: A hook to check if the user is online

items.author: Brendan Dash (https://shadcn-hooks.vercel.app)
